p.k: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky
Historical action with Breaking Bad's Jonathan Banks, depicting the battles, bloodshed and epic power struggle between the Frisian Redbad and his enemy, Pepin of Herstal
72% Mel Gibson stars as a reluctant hero protecting his family, in this all-action epic set against the backdrop of the American War of Independence
40% Action romp based on the hit video game series, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme as a solider taking the fight to crazed military dictator Raul Julia. With Kylie Minogue
75% Mark Wahlberg and Taylor Kitsch star in this compelling war film depicting a 2005 Navy SEALs op in Afghanistan
64% Clive Owen is the legendary leader who unites Britain against fearsome Saxon invaders. Battle-packed medieval action with Keira Knightley and Ray Winstone
73% Blacksmith Orlando Bloom swaps hammer for sword as leader of a great crusade. Epic from Gladiator director Ridley Scott, with Ed Norton and Jeremy Irons
85% Russell Crowe is the Roman general turned vengeful gladiator in this spectacular Oscar-winning epic from director Ridley Scott
